content: and forth round 3 1htr 1htr2tog 1htr in each st to 3st in row over half the sock leaving the from next marker 1htr2tog 1htr 1htr in each remaining top of the foot sts unworked st to end of round 66 72 78 sts row 1 rs using yarn c but leaving yarn a repeat rnds 2 + 3 a further 4 times 42 48 54 sts attached 1dc in each of next 20 24 26 sts repeat round 3 1 0 0 times 40 48 54 sts turn leaving remaining sts unworked 20 24 work the foot 26 sts round 1 1htr in each st to end of round row 2 ws 1ch 1dc in each st to end of row repeat round 1 until foot measures 15 17 turn 20 24 26 sts 18 5 cm/6 6 75 7 25 from the back of the repeat row 2 a further 18 times total of 20 row heel worked on the heel turn the heel work the toe row 1 1ch 12 14 15 double_crochet decrease 1dc turn where you have been working in rnds the leaving remaining sts unworked 14 16 17 sts marker will have veered to the right before row 2 1ch 6dc decrease 1dc turn 8sts starting the toe to fix this simply fold the sock flat with the heel at the back and move the row 3 1ch 1dc in each st to 1 st from end of marker to that point then work your last row row decrease working the first half of the st in to that marked spot the next st and the second half into the next fasten_off yarn a st 2 row below 1dc turn 9sts repeat row 3 a further 3 5 7 times 12 14 16 sts round 1 using yarn b 20 24 27 double_crochet pm 1dc in each st to end of round 40 48 54 sts sizes s + m only round 2 *1dc decrease 1dc in each st to 3sts next row rs 1ch 1dc in each st to 1 st from from next marker decrease 1dc repeat from * end of row decrease working the first half of once 36 44 50 sts the st in the next st and the second half into the next st 2 row below turn 12 14 - sts round 3 1dc in each st to end of round repeat last row once 12 14 - sts repeat rnds 2 and 3 a further 5 6 7 times 16 20 22 sts all sizes fasten_off leaving a long end which is used to fasten_off yarn c seam together the toe finishing close the toe by turning the sock inside out and working a row of slip_stitch through both thicknesses of sts between the two markers gently block to size and shape weave in ends magdalen socks by vicki brown 2
